What, Needle, you're here?\""},{"lineNumber":5,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あんたら何をへらへらしてんのよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What are you guys smirking about!?"},{"lineNumber":6,"originalJapaneseLine":"　マエリータ隊が馬鹿にされてんのよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"The Maerita Squad is being mocked!\""},{"lineNumber":7,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だって、なあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But, you see...\""},{"lineNumber":8,"originalJapaneseLine":"「話は終わりだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The conversation is over."},{"lineNumber":9,"originalJapaneseLine":"　相談中、失礼した」","translatedEnglishLine":"Pardon me for interrupting while you were discussing.\""},{"lineNumber":10,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、こら、こっちの話が","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, wait, our conversation"},{"lineNumber":11,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まだ終わってないわよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"isn't over yet!\""},{"lineNumber":12,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いーや！　もう話は終わりだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No! The discussion is finished!\""},{"lineNumber":13,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何故ならお前らはここで死ぬからだー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Because you are all going to die here!\""},{"lineNumber":14,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む！　カオスマスター！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm! Chaos Master!?\""},{"lineNumber":15,"originalJapaneseLine":"　皆さん、戦闘の用意を……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone, prepare for battle...\""},{"lineNumber":16,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright!\""},{"lineNumber":17,"originalJapaneseLine":"　って、あ、あら……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Wait, oh, what...?\""},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"がくりとマッスルが膝をつく。","translatedEnglishLine":"With a thud, Muscle falls to his knees."},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"周りを見ればそれはほとんどの魔物がそうであり、","translatedEnglishLine":"Looking around, almost all the monsters were like that,"},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"地に伏したまま動けない者もいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"some lay on the ground unable to move."},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺様の作戦に見事にハマったな！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You perfectly fell into my trap!"},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"　がははははははははははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahahahahahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"「カロリア！　もう毒の煙をやめてもいいぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kaloria! You can stop the poisonous smoke now!\""},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぱたぱた、うん、りょうかーい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Flap flap, okay, roger that.\""},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"カロリアはムシ使いの知識の中にある","translatedEnglishLine":"Kaloria, using her knowledge as an insect handler,"},{"lineNumber":26,"originalJapaneseLine":"七輪で焚いた無色無臭の毒煙を、","translatedEnglishLine":"had been releasing colorless, odorless poisonous smoke from a charcoal brazier,"},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"マエリータ隊に送り込み続けていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"continuously sending it towards the Maerita Squad."},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、えへへ、ごめんね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"E-eh heh, sorry...\""},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"　毒と言ってもちょっと体が痺れるくらいだから、","translatedEnglishLine":"It's called poison, but it only makes your body tingle a little,"},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんまり辛くないと思うけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"so I don't think it's too harsh...\""},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がー！　なんて卑怯な奴！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gah! What a dirty trick!\""},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいつ、絶対にブッ殺してやる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll definitely kill that guy!\""},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今宵、死ぬには良い月夜だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tonight is a perfect moonlit night to die!\""},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おーおー、血の気のある奴らは、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh ho, those with fire in their veins"},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まだまだ元気そうだなー」","translatedEnglishLine":"still seem pretty lively.\""},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くう、この誇り高い魔人であるサテラが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, this proud demon Satella,"},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな卑怯で矮小でみっともない手を……」","translatedEnglishLine":"is resorting to such cowardly, petty, and disgraceful tactics...\""},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"「サテラ様、大丈夫デスカ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lady Satella, are you alright?\""},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ごちゃごちゃ言うな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Stop your babbling."},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"　勝てば官軍、それで良いのだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"He who wins is the government army; that's all that matters.\""},{"lineNumber":41,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、それでは突撃ーーーーッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha, then chargeーーー!\""},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"「チィッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch!\""},{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"マエリータ隊の中からアパッチが飛び出した。","translatedEnglishLine":"From the Maerita Squad, Apache rushed out."},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アパッチ！　前に出すぎです！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Apache! You're way too far ahead!\""},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"「問題はない！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No problem!"},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"　腰抜けはそこで見ていろ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Cowards, stay and watch from there!\""},{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ、全員辛いでしょうが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn, everyone must be struggling,"},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんとか戦闘態勢を！」","translatedEnglishLine":"but get into battle formation somehow!\""},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"後ろで叫ぶ学者の声が聞こえているのかいないのか、","translatedEnglishLine":"Whether or not he heard the shouting scholar behind him,"},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"アパッチはランスに単独突撃を敢行する。","translatedEnglishLine":"Apache launched a solo charge against Rance."},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーん？　なんだ一匹だけやたら元気いいな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? What, there's one eager guy all by himself?\""},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……今日は死ぬには良い日だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Today is a good day to die.\""},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guh...!\""},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘の途中、アパッチが膝をついた。","translatedEnglishLine":"During the battle, Apache dropped to his knees."},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"「限界です、マッスル！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm at my limit, Muscle!"},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"　彼を！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Get him!\""},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"「分かってる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Understood!\""},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、まずは一人目ーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha, first oneーーー!\""},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが剣をアパッチに向け振りかざす。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance raised his sword and swung it toward Apache."},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"「オオッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ooh!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦いの場で、そうではないというところを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I hope to see proof on the battlefield that it's not so,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見せてもらえれば、と、そう期待している」
「むっかー！」
「あん？　なんだ、ニードルいたのか？」
「あんたら何をへらへらしてんのよ！
マエリータ隊が馬鹿にされてんのよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Maerita Squad is being mocked!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だって、なあ……」
「話は終わりだ。
相談中、失礼した」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pardon me for interrupting while you were discussing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、こら、こっちの話が
まだ終わってないわよ！」
「いーや！　もう話は終わりだ！」
「何故ならお前らはここで死ぬからだー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because you are all going to die here!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む！　カオスマスター！？
皆さん、戦闘の用意を……」
「おう！
って、あ、あら……？」
がくりとマッスルが膝をつく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a thud, Muscle falls to his knees.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周りを見ればそれはほとんどの魔物がそうであり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking around, almost all the monsters were like that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地に伏したまま動けない者もいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: some lay on the ground unable to move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様の作戦に見事にハマったな！
がははははははははははは！」
「カロリア！　もう毒の煙をやめてもいいぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kaloria! You can stop the poisonous smoke now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぱたぱた、うん、りょうかーい」
カロリアはムシ使いの知識の中にある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaloria, using her knowledge as an insect handler,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 七輪で焚いた無色無臭の毒煙を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: had been releasing colorless, odorless poisonous smoke from a charcoal brazier,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊に送り込み続けていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: continuously sending it towards the Maerita Squad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、えへへ、ごめんね……
毒と言ってもちょっと体が痺れるくらいだから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's called poison, but it only makes your body tingle a little,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんまり辛くないと思うけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I don't think it's too harsh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がー！　なんて卑怯な奴！」
「あいつ、絶対にブッ殺してやる！」
「今宵、死ぬには良い月夜だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tonight is a perfect moonlit night to die!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おーおー、血の気のある奴らは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh ho, those with fire in their veins

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだまだ元気そうだなー」
「くう、この誇り高い魔人であるサテラが、
こんな卑怯で矮小でみっともない手を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is resorting to such cowardly, petty, and disgraceful tactics..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラ様、大丈夫デスカ？」
「ごちゃごちゃ言うな。
勝てば官軍、それで良いのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He who wins is the government army; that's all that matters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、それでは突撃ーーーーッ！」
「チィッ！」
マエリータ隊の中からアパッチが飛び出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the Maerita Squad, Apache rushed out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アパッチ！　前に出すぎです！」
「問題はない！
腰抜けはそこで見ていろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cowards, stay and watch from there!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ、全員辛いでしょうが、
なんとか戦闘態勢を！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but get into battle formation somehow!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後ろで叫ぶ学者の声が聞こえているのかいないのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether or not he heard the shouting scholar behind him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アパッチはランスに単独突撃を敢行する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apache launched a solo charge against Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーん？　なんだ一匹だけやたら元気いいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What, there's one eager guy all by himself?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……今日は死ぬには良い日だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Today is a good day to die."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘の途中、アパッチが膝をついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the battle, Apache dropped to his knees.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「限界です、マッスル！
彼を！」
「分かってる！」
「がははは、まずは一人目ーーー！」
ランスが剣をアパッチに向け振りかざす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance raised his sword and swung it toward Apache.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「オオッ！」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

「チィッ！」
マエリータ隊の中からアパッチが飛び出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the Maerita Squad, Apache rushed out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アパッチ！　前に出すぎです！」
「問題はない！
腰抜けはそこで見ていろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cowards, stay and watch from there!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ、全員辛いでしょうが、
なんとか戦闘態勢を！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but get into battle formation somehow!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後ろで叫ぶ学者の声が聞こえているのかいないのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether or not he heard the shouting scholar behind him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アパッチはランスに単独突撃を敢行する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apache launched a solo charge against Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーん？　なんだ一匹だけやたら元気いいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What, there's one eager guy all by himself?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……今日は死ぬには良い日だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Today is a good day to die."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘の途中、アパッチが膝をついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the battle, Apache dropped to his knees.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「限界です、マッスル！
彼を！」
「分かってる！」
「がははは、まずは一人目ーーー！」
ランスが剣をアパッチに向け振りかざす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance raised his sword and swung it toward Apache.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「オオッ！」
